0.user_question: 41 children were riding on the bus. At the bus stop some children got off the bus. Then there were 18 children left on the bus. How many more children were on the bus before the bus stop than there are now?

ost_step.1: Initially, there were 41 children on the bus.
ost_step.2: After the bus stop, there were 18 children left.
ost_step.3: To find out how many more children were initially, subtract the number of children left from the initial count: 41 - 18 = 23.
